attributes.action: Legalise and Decriminalise Marijuana in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: If you get caught with weed, you are looking at 5-14 years of prison time whereas child molestors would be facing as little as 6 months. That's disgusting.
attributes.background: Too many people are being sent to prison for  having weed. There are much more serious issues on why people should be sent to prison but the government feel weed should be one of the major reasons why you should. It's just wrong.
